Suezo on TV Last Night! (dates and times may vary)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Suezo on TV Last Night! (dates and times may vary)
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, September 9, 2004 - 04:33 pm:

I was watching a show about videogames last night on PBS, the show is called The Video Game Revolution, and saw Suezo about 42 minutes into the first segment! It was just as they started talking about the Tokyo game show, and the footage was of the Tecmo booth, and someone in the Suezo costume. -Kinda nice seeing MR being included in a serious history of gaming.

By John Hawley on Friday, September 10, 2004 - 02:40 am:

It also included.... Mocchi! There was about ten seconds total, but that's more than most companies got even if Tecmo wasn't mentioned by name.

By Red_star_durahan on Friday, September 10, 2004 - 09:55 am:

I saw it but I was suprised they did not say anything about FF.
